ComicInfo.Summary:
The discovery of Ancients in hibernation on board the Destiny along with previously unknown technology has brought Colonel Young, Dr. Rush, Eli and the others to the precipice of a major challenge in their journey, one filled with as much potential danger as they've ever faced. Stargate Universe comic books continue the narrative from where the TV series left off! Stargate Universe #4 comes with three covers - Main Cover by Greg LaRocque, Photo Cover, and a special Premium Limited Edition Flashback Photo Cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Greg LaRocque | 1 | Var | Photo Variant Cover | Photo | 2 | LE | Limited Edition Premium Flashback Cover | Photo | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-02 07:52:09. [CVDB665013]
ComicInfo.Writer: J. C. Vaughn, Mark L. Haynes
ComicInfo.Characters: Adam Brody, Camile Wray, Dale Volker, Eli Wallace, Everett Young, Gary Guzzo, Inman, Matthew Scott, Nicholas Rush, Ronald Greer, Vasi
